us.phonetic: /v. kənˈstrʌkt; n. ˈkɑnstrʌkt/, (v. kən strukt′; n. kon′strukt)

example.eg: The city plans to construct a new community center.
example.egtrans: 这个城市计划建造一处全新的社区中心。

example.eg: The students learned how to construct effective sentences.
example.egtrans: 学生学会了如何构建有效的句子。

example.eg: Traditionally, sex is seen as biological and immutable, whereas gender is a construct.
example.egtrans: 传统上，生理性别被认为是天生且不可改变的，而社会性别则是一种人造物。

us.phonetic: /v. kənˈstrʌkt; n. ˈkɑnstrʌkt/, (v. kən strukt′; n. kon′strukt)

example.eg: Certain sentence constructs can be more effective for persuasion than others.
